message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but $12,000 is a bit too steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $11,000.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $11,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $10,000.  This is my final offer. Let me know if it works for you.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to give you a slight discount, but I need to make a profit. I'll sell it to you for $11,500.
